document.full_text: joe thornton scored the game winning goal in overtime as the san jose sharks beat the los angeles kings 4-3 on monday and eliminated them from the first round of the playoffs.
document.title: sharks eliminate kings in ot, lightning take pens
lines_and_colors: joe thornton scored the game winning goal in overtime as the san jose sharks beat the los angeles kings 4-3 on monday and eliminated them from the first round of the playoffs.
